Q1: I clearly state my limits when expectations are unrealistic.
Q2: I am comfortable pushing back when scope is unclear.
Q3: When plans change suddenly, I adjust my decisions quickly.
Q4: I am comfortable making decisions without complete information.
Q5: I remain calm in emotionally charged situations.
Q6: I recover quickly after stressful interactions.
Q7: I organise complex problems into clear steps.
Q8: I prefer structured thinking over ad-hoc solutions.
Q9: I collaborate well with people holding different views.
Q10: I actively seek opportunities to learn and improve.
Q11: I take initiative without needing explicit direction.
